languages.text: "Я сначала подумала, что они наконец-то решили меня прикончить. Надо же, иногда и ведьму кто-то спасает!"
"At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"
languages.original_text: "Я сначала подумала, что они наконец-то решили меня прикончить. Надо же, иногда и ведьму кто-то спасает!"

traits.locale_text: "At first I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise, even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"
"At first I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise, even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"
"At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"
"At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"
"At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"
"At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"
"At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"

languages.text: «Al principio, pensé que venían a acabar conmigo. Qué sorpresa, ¡hasta a las brujas nos rescatan de vez en cuando!».
languages.original_text: "At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"

traits.locale_text: «Al principio, pensé que venían a acabar conmigo. Qué sorpresa, ¡hasta a las brujas nos rescatan de vez en cuando!».

languages.text: 「最初は、彼らが私を仕留めに来たのだと思ったよ。魔女でも助けられることがあるんだなんて、驚きさ！」
languages.original_text: "At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"

traits.locale_text: 「最初は、彼らが私を仕留めに来たのだと思ったよ。魔女でも助けられることがあるんだなんて、驚きさ！」

languages.text: “我一开始还以为他们打算把我干掉。这可真让人吃惊，没想到，有时候就连女巫也会获救！”
languages.original_text: "At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"

traits.locale_text: “我一开始还以为他们打算把我干掉。这可真让人吃惊，没想到，有时候就连女巫也会获救！”

languages.text: "Zunächst dachte ich, sie wären gekommen, um mir den Rest zu geben. Welch Überraschung: Sogar eine Hexe wird bisweilen gerettet!"
languages.original_text: "At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"

traits.locale_text: "Zunächst dachte ich, sie wären gekommen, um mir den Rest zu geben. Welch Überraschung: Sogar eine Hexe wird bisweilen gerettet!"

languages.text: « Au début, j'ai cru qu'ils venaient pour m'achever. Quelle ne fut pas ma surprise quand j'ai compris que même une sorcière comme moi pouvait parfois compter sur une main secourable ! »
languages.original_text: "At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"

traits.locale_text: « Au début, j'ai cru qu'ils venaient pour m'achever. Quelle ne fut pas ma surprise quand j'ai compris que même une sorcière comme moi pouvait parfois compter sur une main secourable ! »

languages.text: "En başta işimi bitirmek için geldiklerini sandım. Şaşkınlığımı düşünsenize. Arada sırada cadıları bile kurtaran oluyormuş!"
languages.original_text: "At first, I thought they were coming to finish me off. What a surprise: even a witch gets rescued sometimes!"
